item.title: New Publications
item.description:
The prestigious 2022’s IEEE International Ultrasonics Symposium (IUS) has accepted two abstracts submitted by Yi Zheng and Hui Zhu, respectively.

They will present their works at the conference to be held in Venice, Italy, on October 10-13, 2022. Congratulations!

item.title: New Publications
item.description:
Xiran Cai has published two chapters in the book “Bone Quantitative Ultrasound New Horizons”, reporting the latest development of resonant ultrasound spectroscopy for high damping solids and its application in measuring the anisotropic stiffness of hard tissue.

Details can be found following the link

item.title: New roles
item.description: Hui Zhu successfully defended her application of MS to PhD conversion.

item.title: Support
item.description: Xiran Cai received the support of “Shanghai Overseas Talent Program”.

item.title: New Members
item.description: SUSIT lab is officially open and welcomes 2 members (Master students), Gaofei Jin, Hui Zhu.

item.title: New Members
item.description: SUSIT lab welcomes 3 new members (Master students), Yifei Li, Shilong Cui, Bowei Yao.

item.title: Support
item.description: Xiran Cai received a grant from “Shanghai Sailing Program”.

item.title: New Members
item.description: SUSIT lab welcomes 2 new members (Undergrads), Yiming Huang, Chenguang Wang.
